meanings.definition: To place in a particular position.
meanings.sent1: She puts the book on the table.
meanings.sent2: He puts his shoes by the door every night.
meanings.sent3: The cat puts its paw on the toy mouse, thinking it's real.
meanings.sent4: The sun puts the whole sky in a golden embrace at sunset.
meanings.sent5: Mom puts a kiss on my forehead before bedtime.

meanings.definition: To bring into a particular state or condition.
meanings.sent1: Eating vegetables puts you in good health.
meanings.sent2: Exercise puts your body in a strong and fit condition.
meanings.sent3: The rainy weather puts a damper on our picnic plans.
meanings.sent4: Laughter puts a sparkle in her eyes.
meanings.sent5: Music puts a smile on my face even on a gloomy day.

meanings.definition: To express in words or writing.
meanings.sent1: She puts her thoughts into a journal every night.
meanings.sent2: He puts his feelings into a heartfelt letter.
meanings.sent3: The comedian puts his jokes out there for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent4: Her song puts emotions into beautiful melodies.
meanings.sent5: The poet puts his soul into every line he writes.
